msg.msgText: The "imaserver trace flush" command flushes the trace buffer, and writes buffered data to the trace file. The "imaserver trace message <text>" command flushes the trace buffer, and writes buffered data to the trace file with a message specified by <text>. SYNTAX: imaserver trace help imaserver trace flush imaserver trace message <text> NOTES: 1. <text> is a required value for the "imaserver trace message" command, and must be enclosed in double quotation marks.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
